abstract: Bank of New York Mellon’s chief executive, Robert Kelly, was recently approached about taking the top job at Bank of America, but he has shown no interest in the job, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Bank of New York Mellon’s chief executive, Robert Kelly, was recently approached about taking the top job at Bank of America, but he has shown no interest in the job, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Bank of New York Mellon‘s chief executive, Robert Kelly, was recently approached about taking the top job at Bank of America, but he has shown no interest in the job, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: New York-Mellon Chief Said to Pass on BofA Offer
